name: Random Ninja
description:
Hi guys! At the beginning, I designed it as an internal Construct 2 tech-demo. Over time, the project has evolved and I changed it in the ultra annoying platormer... It's nothing special really, but still, I'm very proud of it - mainly because it's my very first published game. :P

I would be greatful for your feedback - please leave rating and comment. I will update it with new levels, features and more demending gameplay. There is also mobile version.

Cheers, qam!
